SAINT.Name: Monkmartyr Anastasius the Deacon of the Kievan Caves, near caves (12th C)
Martyred Bishops Manuel, George, Peter, Leontius and Martyred Priests Sionius, Gabriel, John, Leontius, Parodus and 377 others in Bulgaria (+ c. 817)
Venerable Macarius of Zhabyn and Belevsk, the Wonderworker (+1623)
